entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
